Posts.Content: Thank you Kate, I know I have to give time, time but it's a struggle already. But I'm not on my own with lovely, sympathetic people like yourself around. I'm still feeling my way round this site- not sure whether I'm doing it 'right'! Still, that's the least of my problems!!!
Posts.Title: Diagnosed last week- waiting for biopsy results

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm just starting on this road and would really appreciate any replies, being told I have 2 cancer tumours is still sinking in. I get the biopsy results on Tuesday, taking things one day at a time right now.
Posts.Title: Diagnosed last week- waiting for biopsy results

Posts.Content: Hi Lorna, Thank you for your reply and I think the Macmillan website is a really good source of sensible info. Last week, I was at home and keeping busy doing short distracting jobs , nothing strenuous, but this weekend I've found it harder. I have been waking up in the night since that Thursday which is 10 days ago. I have been in touch with people who have any cancer success stories but it doesn't change anything. I am thinking of your Mum's appointment tomorrow and pray that you get answers to your questions. :)
Posts.Title: Diagnosed last week- waiting for biopsy results

Posts.Content: Thank you Maggie, I've asked a friend who had breast cancer 8 years ago, to come with my husband and myself. I felt really low this afternoon, had a little cry, and actually sitting writing on this feels more positive. Thanks again :)
Posts.Title: Diagnosed last week- waiting for biopsy results
